description:
Griddler beware, you're in for a scare!

Depixtion: Halloween blends color mixing mechanics with the rules of nonograms to create a uniquely colorful, and 
horrifying experience.

Features:

- 50 Cursed Depixtion Images -  150 Haunted Nonograms
- Horrifying puzzles of all sizes: 4x4, 8x8, 12x12, 16x16, 20x20, and 24x24
- Spookier color palette. Now with 100% more Grey!
name: Depixtion: Halloween
